sentences.sContent: Why does a trumpet--If I asked a trumpet to play this pitch, a trumpet played, and then I asked an oboe to play it, the sound would be very different.
sentences.sContent_eng: Why does a trumpet--If I asked a trumpet to play this pitch, a trumpet played, and then I asked an oboe to play it, the sound would be very different.
sentences.sCn: 小号为什么...,如果我用小号演奏这个音高,小号演奏后,我又让双簧管来演奏,声音会很不一样

trans.tranOther: a wooden musical instrument like a narrow tube, which you play by blowing air through a reed
